directions: Combine nutritional yeast, salt, cumin, garlic powder, onion powder, paprika, chili powder, and cayenne pepper in a small bowl.
Place popcorn in a bowl; add nutritional yeast mixture and toss to coat.
ingredients: 1/8 teaspoon cayenne pepper, or more to taste (optional)
8 cups hot popcorn, or as desired
title: "Doritos®" Popcorn
